Body:
filename, fid = hdf_dataset2
dset_list = lazy5.inspect.get_datasets(fid)
mos = Mosaic()
for n in range(10):
    mos.append(fid[dset_list[n]])
assert mos.size == 10
assert mos.issamedim
mos.parameters['Order'] = 'R'
assert mos.mosaic2d((5, 2)).shape == (5 * 3, 2 * 4)
mos.parameters['Order'] = 'C'
assert mos.mosaic2d((5, 2)).shape == (5 * 3, 2 * 4)
